Shopify Sliding Reviews Section

Learn how to create a Sliding Reviews section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The "Sliding Reviews" section is a highly customizable and visually appealing way to display customer reviews or testimonials on your Shopify store. This section allows you to present multiple reviews in a sleek, sliding carousel format. Perfect for showcasing feedback on various products or services, the section enhances your store's credibility and helps convert visitors into customers. Customize fonts, colors, layout, and autoplay settings to perfectly match your store's design.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Premium Sections
  3. Search for "Sliding Reviews"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Product Reviews: Use this section to showcase positive reviews for specific products directly on the product pages.
  2. Customer Testimonials: Display customer experiences on the homepage to build trust with new visitors.
  3. Featured Clients: Highlight testimonials from well-known clients or brands to add social proof to your services page.
  4. Seasonal Promotions: Show seasonal or event-specific testimonials, e.g., wedding or holiday product reviews.
  5. Service Feedback: Share client feedback for services you offer, such as consultations or subscriptions.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  1. Font Settings:

    • Override Theme Fonts: Option to use custom fonts.
    • Headline Font: Font for headlines.
    • Text Font: Font for body text.

  2. Text Settings:

    • Text Size: Adjustable size for the main text.
    • Cite Size: Adjustable size for the citation text.
    • Text Line Height: Various line height options.
    • Text Color: Color picker for text color.
    • Headline Size: Adjustable size for the headline text.
    • Headline Line Height: Various line height options for the headline.
    • Headline Color: Color picker for the headline color.

  3. Color Settings:

    • Background Color: Color picker for the section background.
    • Slide Background Color: Color picker for the slide background.
    • Progress Background Color: Color picker for the progress bar background.
    • Progress Foreground Color: Color picker for the progress bar foreground.
    • Indicator Color: Color picker for the slide indicator color.

  4. Dimensions Settings:

    • Max Width of Section: Set the maximum width in pixels.
    • Padding (Top, Bottom, Left, Right): Set paddings for the section and elements.
    • Spacing Between Elements: Adjust the spacing between elements in pixels.

  5. Slide Settings:

    • Slide Padding: Adjust the padding inside each slide.
    • Slide Height: Set the height of each slide.
    • Image Height: Set the height of images in each slide.
    • Round Borders on Slide: Adjust the border radius for slide images.
    • Subtle Shadow on Slide: Toggle a subtle shadow on each slide.
    • Slide Aspect Ratio: Choose from 21:9, 16:9, 4:3, or 1:1 aspect ratios.
    • Review Alignment: Align the review text (center, left, right).

  6. Headline and Content Settings:

    • Headline: Set text and format for the headline.
    • Headline Alignment: Align the headline (center, left, right).
    • Content: Set text and format for the content.
    • Content Alignment: Align the content text (center, left, right).

  7. Slideshow Settings:

    • Enable Autoplay?: Toggle autoplay for the slideshow.
    • Autoplay Time: Choose autoplay duration from options between 2s to 10s.

  8. Blocks Settings (for each review):

    • Image: Upload an image for each review or testimonial.
    • Review or Testimonial: Text field for the main review or testimonial.
    • Review Source: Text field for providing the reviewer's name or source.
